titleStmt.title: Moderate message to Quakers, seekers and Socinians, by a friend and well-wisher to them all, or Some arguments offered to clear up three points in difference betwixt them and others ... By John Child.
titleStmt.author: Child, John, 1638?-1684.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"Three questions offered to be disputed with John Bunion ...": p. [1] at end.
Advertising matter on p. [2]-[4] at end.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
